code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% L++ State Diagram: TLAPS Seal Certifier
    [FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> idle
    idle --> loading : CERTIFY
    loading --> auditing : AUTO [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    auditing --> generating_tla : AUTO [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    generating_tla --> tlc_verifying : AUTO [FinTech_LedgerService]
    tlc_verifying --> tlc_verified : AUTO [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    tlc_verified --> tlaps_proving : PROVE [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    tlaps_proving --> certified : AUTO [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    tlc_verified --> certified : SEAL_TLC [FinTech_FraudDetection]
    auditing --> rejected : AUTO [FinTech_AuthVault]
    tlc_verifying --> rejected : AUTO [FinTech_LedgerService]
    tlaps_proving --> rejected : AUTO [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    loading --> idle : RESET
    auditing --> idle : RESET
    generating_tla --> idle : RESET
    rejected --> idle : RESET
    tlc_verifying --> idle : RESET
    tlc_verified --> idle : RESET
    certified --> idle : RESET
    tlaps_proving --> idle : RESET
    certified --> certified : VIEW [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    rejected --> [FinTech_LedgerService]
    certified --> [FinTech_AuthVault]
repo_description: L++ is not a programming language. It is a language-agnostic Logic Frame designed to execute business processes defined in purely symbolic, declarative blueprints.
